titleStmt.title: Historical collections, out of several grave Protestant historians concerning the changes of religion, and the strange confusions following in the reigns of King Henry the Eighth, Edward the Sixth, Queen Mary and Elizabeth : with an addition of several remarkable passages taken out of Sir Will. Dugdale's Antiquities of Warwickshire, relating to the abbies and their institution.
titleStmt.author: Touchet, Anselm, d. 1689?
Hickes, George, 1642-1715.
Dugdale, William, Sir, 1605-1686.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Wrongly attributed by Lowndes to Dr. George Hickes.
Attributed to George Touchet. cf. BM.
